Who

am I in the world?

.. and what are my aspirations?

I am a multimedia design student in my 3rd semester at KEA, driven by a lifelong passion for art and design. Through my studies, I have developed skills in digital design methods, gaining experience in user-oriented web solutions, prototyping in Figma, and frontend programming with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

I am dedicated to creating meaningful user experiences, with a particular interest in UX/UI design. I love bringing ideas to life and ensuring that my designs are not only aesthetically pleasing but also intuitive and functional. With a keen eye for detail, I strive to deliver high-quality work that addresses user needs and captures the essence of a brand.

Teamwork is essential to my approach, as I believe that collaboration and challenging each other’s ideas lead to the best outcomes. I am seeking an internship where I can delve deeper into learning, explore new techniques in UX/UI design, and gain practical experience while pushing the boundaries of design to create valuable solutions for users.

I enjoy the creative process, from the initial sketch to the final user interface, finding inspiration in the balance between aesthetics and functionality to craft exceptional user experiences.

Who

am I in the digital landscape? .. and what are my aspirations?

I am a multimedia design student in my 3rd semester at KEA, driven by a lifelong passion for art and design. Through my studies, I have developed skills in digital design methods, gaining experience in user-oriented web solutions, prototyping in Figma, and frontend programming with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

I am dedicated to creating meaningful user experiences, with a particular interest in UX/UI design. I love bringing ideas to life and ensuring that my designs are not only aesthetically pleasing but also intuitive and functional. With a keen eye for detail, I strive to deliver high-quality work that addresses user needs and captures the essence of a brand.

Teamwork is essential to my approach, as I believe that collaboration and challenging each other’s ideas lead to the best outcomes. I am seeking an internship where I can delve deeper into learning, explore new techniques in UX/UI design, and gain practical experience while pushing the boundaries of design to create valuable solutions for users.

I enjoy the creative process, from the initial sketch to the final user interface, finding inspiration in the balance between aesthetics and functionality to craft exceptional user experiences.

Linkedbtn

Skills

Figma

Figma er min trofaste ven hvor jeg nemt kan lave wireframes og prototyper som er overskuelige og visuelt lækkert til gav for alle i fx. projektarbejde.

Adobe CC

I Adobe pakken bruger jeg mest programmerne Photoshop og Illustrator til billedredigering, grafik til websites og illustrationer som logoer.

Html, Css & Js

Jeg kan også kode hjemmesider fra bunden ved hjælp af HTML 5, CSS, Javascript og Tailwind. Til det bruger jeg programmet Visual Studio Code.

CodePen

CodePen bruger jeg til at eksperimentere kreativt med design og hurtigt se resultaterne af mine HTML, CSS og JavaScript-projekter i realtid.

ChatGpt

ChatGPT er en god inspirationskilde, som effektivt kan hjælpe med idéer til designudfordringer og tekster, mens jeg udvikler mine projekter.
